definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: A robot-arm from the Endeavour will grab the telescope.
sentences.chinese: “奮進”號上的一隻機器手將抓住望遠鏡並托住它。

sentences.english: A thin and weak girl susceptible to diseases, she wrote one inspiring novel after another with her strong will.
sentences.chinese: 以她堅強的毅力寫出了一部催人奮進的小說。

sentences.english: The devotion of the aged couple is inspiring.
sentences.chinese: 老人的摯愛是催人奮進的。

sentences.english: Drums, the most progressive and concerted efforts will inspire innovation.
sentences.chinese: 鼓，最能激勵創新奮進與同心同德。

sentences.english: Endeavour's next mission will be a stationary one in the California Science Center.
sentences.chinese: 奮進號的下一個任務將是停留在加利福尼亞科學中心。

sentences.english: Tangshan in my eyes is an inspiring city.
sentences.chinese: 唐山在我眼中是座催人奮進的城市。

sentences.english: We have strong technical strength and forge ahead in unity leadership.
sentences.chinese: 本廠擁有雄厚的技術力量和團結奮進的領導班子。

sentences.english: Jump to the sun, at least you will land on the moon!
sentences.chinese: 朝太陽奮進，至少你會在月球着陸。

sentences.english: In July 1768, the Endeavour set out for the Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 在1768年七月，“奮進號”向太平洋進發。

sentences.english: This will be the last mission for Endeavour, and the second-to-last mission for the U.
sentences.chinese: 這次飛行，將是奮進號的最後一次使命。

sentences.english: The seven-person crew aboard Endeavour lifted off during a rare nighttime launch from Kennedy Space Center in Florida.
sentences.chinese: 美國奮進號航天飛機開始了一次雄心勃勃的太空使命。

sentences.english: Endeavour's last first sunrise at the launch pad.
sentences.chinese: 奮進號最後一次在發射臺上迎來的第一縷陽光。
勤勉奮進口號到處都是。

sentences.english: Thee shuttle Endeavour will be taking the astronauts to the Hubble.
sentences.chinese: 斁“奮進”號航天飛機將把宇航員送上哈勃望遠钂。

sentences.english: But there are many bright and motivating examples of success everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 但是，許多催人奮進的成功光輝例證比比皆是。

sentences.english: Tangshan in the eyes of the public is an inspiring city.
sentences.chinese: 唐山在衆人眼中是座催人奮進的城市。

definition: to rouse to vigorous action/energetic mood
to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition/forming a bridge between earlier and later stages
full of youthful energy (idiom); vigorous/energetic/a bright spark
lit. to cut one's way through thistles and thorns (idiom)/fig. to overcome all obstacles on the way/to break through hardships/to blaze a new trail
to develop/to make full use of
to do everything one can/to spare no effort/to strive
the tone of a school/campus atmosphere
to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts/to pull together/to work as one
